initial_greeting: Greetings. I am the Bandit King. Name yourself!
talked_already: What's up? Couldn't get enough of me? Hahaha!

talked_previously.text: I hope you're enjoying the party.

asked_for_info.text: What would you like to know?

choices.text: What's the deal with the Mayor?
I want to know about you.
Do you find anyone here suspicious?
Nevermind actually. I think I'll just go.

provide_mayor_info.text: Well... He's a big handsome hunk of a man. Some might even say dashing... Why do you ask?

end_distant.text: Secretive I see. So be it. Farewell.

bk_provide_sus.text: There's no one suspicious here. You have nothing to worry about. Is there anything else you wanted to know?

curious_response.text: Just curious? Sorry son, that's not good enough. Go have fun, or did you need something else?

provide_bandit_king_info.text: Me? Well I've conquered the plains, the seas, and the castles. Ye Old Bandit King! A leader, a man of power. I could go on if you'd like.

choices.text: No it's okay. I have more questions though.

bk_yap_about_self.text: Of course! I am a scholar born from the heavens. A man of principle whom is loved by his people. I am Ye Old Bandit King!

choices.text: I think you're amazing. I've got to go now though.

confront_bk.text: What?! No more questions from you.

bk_slip_up.text: ... All of the world's people exist under Ye Old Bandit King! Haven't you asked me enough? Or do you want to bother me some more?

choices.text: I'll leave you alone. Sorry King.
